Room.Name: On a rough dirt path through the forest
Room.Description: You are walking on a narrow, badly kept dirt track. All around you the trees are thick and dark, creating cool shadows all around you. The path heads east into the forest or west to what looks like a small outpost.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads south and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. All around you lies the darkened forest, while the path heads north and east.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path continues south and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads north, east and south.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. All around you lies the darkened forest, while the path heads east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. All around you lies the darkened forest, while the path heads east and west. To the south you can see large stone ruins in the trees.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. All around you lies the darkened forest, while the path heads east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads south and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads north and east.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads south and west.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads north and south.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. To the west you can make out some stone ruins amidst the trees. The path heads north.

Room.Name: Before some stone ruins
Room.Description: You find yourself standing amidst the rubble and decay of some ancient city. Beautifully worked stones of old dwarven workmanship lie scattered across the ground and a dark, cold shadow seems to cover everything. The faint shapes of creatures can be seen moving from within the ruins, while all around you the forests seem subdued and quiet. A narrow path heads east into the forest, or you can go west into the ruins of Myth Drannor.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads north and south through the dark forest.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. The path heads north and south through the dark forest.

Room.Name: On a rough dirt track through the forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow pathway through the dense forest. It apppears little used and much of the surrounding foliage has overgrown onto it. In the shadow of the surrounding forest you see faint movement and hear the sounds of creatures in the underbrush. You can see some stone ruins to the east, and the path heads north.

Room.Name: Before some stone ruins
Room.Description: You find yourself standing amidst the rubble and decay of some ancient city. Beautifully worked stones of old dwarven workmanship lie scattered across the ground and a dark, cold shadow seems to cover everything. The faint shapes of creatures can be seen moving from within the ruins, while all around you the forests seem subdued and quiet. A narrow path heads west into the forest, or you can go north into the ruins of Myth Drannor.

Room.Name: Before some stone ruins
Room.Description: You find yourself standing amidst the rubble and decay of some ancient city. Beautifully worked stones of old dwarven workmanship lie scattered across the ground and a dark, cold shadow seems to cover everything. The faint shapes of creatures can be seen moving from within the ruins, while all around you the forests seem subdued and quiet. A narrow path heads north into the forest, or you can go south into the ruins of Myth Drannor.

Room.Name: Within the Forest of Myth Drannor
Room.Description: You are standing deep within the darkened forests of Myth Drannor. What the elves once cared for is now corrupted and twisted, and much of the beauty of the land if now gone. The trees are foreboding and loom threateningly above you, and the undergrowth is filled with small, scuttling creatures. The forest spreads out all around you, making it hard to see anything.

Room.Name: Within the Forest of Myth Drannor
Room.Description: You are standing deep within the darkened forests of Myth Drannor. What the elves once cared for is now corrupted and twisted, and much of the beauty of the land if now gone. The trees are foreboding and loom threateningly above you, and the undergrowth is filled with small, scuttling creatures. The forest spreads out all around you, making it hard to see anything.

Room.Description: You are walking on a narrow, badly kept dirt track. All around you the trees are thick and dark, creating cool shadows all around you. The path heads east into the forest or west to what looks like a small outpost.

NPC.name: scout man
NPC.description: This man has the bearing of one who is set in his ideals. He watches the forests for intruders and to prevent the further spread of it's evil beyond the forest confines.
NPC.longDescription: A man forest armor is watching you from the trees.
NPC.shortDescription: a Knight scout of Myth Drannor

NPC.name: giant spider
NPC.description: This bloated spider is as large as a small horse. It's spindly legs twitch as it scuttles across the ground.
NPC.longDescription: A giant spider scuttles at you from out of the undergrowth.

NPC.name: treant tree
NPC.description: There is something almost majestic about the sheer power and size of this creature. A pair of deep brown eyes seem to reside within the tree-like creature and they stare at you in contempt.
NPC.longDescription: A huge tree opens it's eyes and regards you with disdain.

NPC.name: darkened beast
NPC.description: This creature resembles a large black dog, but it's tail is spiked and it's eyes are a malevolent red. A snarl of fierce hate sounds from it's jaws.
NPC.longDescription: A large darken beast stalks the forest for prey.

NPC.name: elf skeleton
NPC.description: This is one the the long dead elven warriors who vowed to forever keep watch over the city of Myth Drannor. Even in death his vows have been kept, and now he stands eternal watch over the dead city's gates.
NPC.longDescription: The skeletal remains of an ancient elf rise up before you!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion DarkVision

NPC.name: shade
NPC.description: A feeling of cold dread passes across you as this shadow slowly turns to regard you. Pale blue eyes can be seen in it's flickering form, but little else of substance seems to exist.
NPC.longDescription: A cold and insubstantial shadow moves amongst the trees.

Item.Name: rust iron sword
Item.LongDescription: A rust covered iron sword lies on the ground.

Item.Name: cloth tunic forest green
Item.LongDescription: A tunic of soft green cloth is on the ground.
